content.text: Several bug fixes have been implemented in recent pull requests, including resolving a cyclic error (PR #4266), fixing Discord voice join/leave actions (PR #4265), addressing Discord actions issues (PR #4264), and correcting a problem with starting agents (PR #4209).
New features have been added, including a missing bootstrap plugin to the list (PR #4267) and GUI support for importing JSON to create or update agents (PR #4270).

Several improvements have been made to the user interface and codebase, including replacing text input with dropdown for voice model selection (PR #4262), clarifying terminology and required fields in agent settings (PR #4274), removing dead code around plugin installation (PR #4263), and merging a branch (PR #4271).

categories.title: Recent Pull Requests in elizaOS/eliza Repository

content.text:
Several pull requests have been submitted to the elizaOS/eliza repository addressing various issues and improvements:

- PR #4263 by wtfsayo removes dead code related to plugin installation, cleaning up the codebase.

- PR #4264, #4265, and #4266 by tcm390 focus on Discord integration fixes: a small fix for Discord actions, resolving a cyclic error, and fixing Discord voice join/leave actions.

- PR #4273 by HarshModi2005 introduces UI changes to improve the user interface.

- PR #4274 by Y4NK33420 clarifies terminology and required fields in the Agent Settings section, making it more user-friendly.

- PR #4271 by HarshModi2005 is a branch merge, likely integrating previously developed features.

categories.title: Recent GitHub Issues in the elizaOS/eliza Repository

content.text:
Three recent issues have been reported in the elizaOS/eliza GitHub repository:

1. Issue #2919: A feature request to implement Reranked Contextual Embedding + cBM25 as the default RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) implementation, based on an Anthropic blog post. This was submitted by user LinuxIsCool.

2. Issue #4269: A problem where Discord doesn't reply when deployed with Docker on Google Cloud Run. This issue was reported by user jiggyjo11.

3. Issue #4272: A bug report indicating that the X bot doesn't respond to any mentions at all. This was submitted by user Valcyclovir.

These issues span feature requests and functionality problems across different deployment environments and platforms.

Over the past two days (April 11-13, 2025), the elizaos/eliza repository has shown consistent activity. The project had a total of 11 new pull requests, with 10 of them successfully merged. There were 2 new issues opened during this period. The repository maintained a steady contributor base with 10 active contributors working on the project throughout this timeframe.
sources: From 2025-04-11 to 2025-04-12, elizaos/eliza had 6 new PRs (6 merged), 1 new issues, and 10 active contributors.
From 2025-04-12 to 2025-04-13, elizaos/eliza had 5 new PRs (4 merged), 1 new issues, and 10 active contributors.
